item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Musk’s cuts fail to stop US federal spending hitting new record
2. EU and Canada retaliate after Trump’s metals tariffs take effect
3. Blackstone and Goldman Sachs CEOs see upsides to Trump’s policies
4. [Opinion] Recession will not make Trump change course
5. Staley referred to Epstein as ‘uncle Jeffrey’ in email to daughter, court hears
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
